name: Chadtech.Colors

values.name: background0
values.comment: Actual black. Should rarely be used, but used to demonstrate absolute minimum brightness.

values.name: background1
values.comment: A darker version of background2. Could be mistaken as black. This color exists mainly to emphasize the visual effect of being in the background, or for contrast against `background2`

values.name: background2
values.comment: `background2` is the default background color. Not totally black, and slightly turqoise, but still dark

values.name: background3
values.comment: A lighter version of `background2`. Usually used to highlight list items against `background2`

values.name: critical
values.comment: This color is for things that demand attention and must be noticed. It should be used sparingly, if at all.

values.name: good
values.comment: When things are successful, this color is used.

values.name: ignorable0
values.comment: This color is called "ignorable", its for unimportant things the user can be forgotten.

values.name: ignorable1
values.comment: `ignorable1` is darker than `ignorable0`

values.name: ignorable2
values.comment: `ignorable2` is darker than `ignorable1`

values.name: ignorable3
values.comment: `ignorable3` is darker than `ignorable2`

values.name: important0
values.comment: When some text needs priority or attention

values.name: important1
values.comment: When some text needs even more priority or attention

values.name: lowWarning
values.comment: Warnings, but not the "critical melt down" sort, more the "something isnt right" sort.

values.name: point0
values.comment: Point, the default color of text and content. If things are the content that should be presented, then they should be colored `point0`. They are "the point" of the web app.

values.name: point1
values.comment: `point0`, but brighter. Useful for lighting up `poi0 during a hover over.

values.name: prettyBlue
values.comment: When things need to be decorated, they are blue. Blue is the color to make things look pretty. Its the color for things that are special.
